name: 今、私たちの学校は...
description:
No place to safe. Still, survive.

The worldwide hit webtoon "All of Us are Dead" is now available as a visual novel game!

The chemistry laboratory of a high school in a provincial city.
The peaceful school life is transformed into a hellish world after one student is bitten by a laboratory animal.
The students, confined in a zombie-infested school building and with nowhere to run, wish, fight and struggle to escape and survive from this hell.

Experience a story of teenagers in extreme conditions, different from webtoons and dramas.

■ New interpretations, new scenarios ■
The basic scenario structure is based on the original story, but has been interpreted and adapted into a visual novel. The ending changes depending on the player's choices, so please enjoy a new story that differs from the original manga and drama.

■ Renewed artwork ■
The character designs and accessories were adapted from the original story for the visual novel adaptation to suit the modern era. The tragedy is made more accessible by representing high school life 'now'.

■ Large volume of event stills ■
High-quality event illustrations numbering approximately 100 and, The event presentation, which is like watching a frame animation, creates a thrilling and immersive experience.

Original Comics from
NAVER WEBTOON?
Joo Dong-Geun


Published by G CHOICE.
